name: Drawbox VR
description:
Drawbox VR is a creative fun game for HTC Vive.

You are literally able to draw whatever you want. Bring your imagination to the reality and enjoy the game.

Official Video Review: Video

Feadures:

*Great brush, palette and environment controller*

*Detailed and unique creations with amazing skybox pack*

*Model sketcher, interior/ exterior designer*

Creator: Matej Vančo
Composition help and Video Actor: Kristian Kollar

#HTCvive #VR #vr #draw #draw3d
